item.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
item.content:encoded: Set more than a decade after the events of the first film, learn the story of the Sully family (Jake, Neytiri, and their kids), the trouble that follows them, the lengths they go to keep each other safe, the battles they fight to stay alive, and the tragedies they endure.

item.title: Black Adam
item.content:encoded: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods—and imprisoned just as quickly—Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

item.title: Troll
item.content:encoded: Deep inside the mountain of Dovre, something gigantic awakens after being trapped for a thousand years. Destroying everything in its path, the creature is fast approaching the capital of Norway. But how do you stop something you thought only existed in Norwegian folklore?

item.title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
item.content:encoded: During the rise of fascism in Mussolini's Italy, a wooden boy brought magically to life struggles to live up to his father's expectations.

item.title: Avatar
item.content:encoded: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

item.title: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again
item.content:encoded: Nick Daley is following in his father's footsteps as night watchman at the American Museum of Natural History, so he knows what happens when the sun goes down. But when the maniacal ruler Kahmunrah escapes, it is up to Nick to save the museum once and for all.
item.wp:post_name: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again

item.title: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again.jpg
item.wp:post_name: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again.jpg

item.title: The Woman King
item.content:encoded: The story of the Agojie, the all-female unit of warriors who protected the African Kingdom of Dahomey in the 1800s with skills and a fierceness unlike anything the world has ever seen, and General Nanisca as she trains the next generation of recruits and readies them for battle against an enemy determined to destroy their way of life.

item.title: My Name Is Vendetta
item.content:encoded: After old enemies kill his family, a former mafia enforcer and his feisty daughter flee to Milan, where they hide out while plotting their revenge.

item.title: The Independent
item.content:encoded: It's the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election in history. America is poised to elect either its first female president or its first viable independent candidate. Reporting history as it's made, an idealistic young journalist teams up with her idol, legendary journalist Nick Booker, to uncover a conspiracy that places the fate of the election, and the country, in their hands.

item.title: Detective Knight: Rogue
item.content:encoded: As Los Angeles prepares for Halloween, mask-wearing armed robbers critically wound detective James Knight’s partner in a shootout following a heist. With Knight in hot pursuit, the bandits flee L.A. for New York, where the detective’s dark past collides with his present case and threatens to tear his world apart…unless redemption can claim Knight first.

item.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
item.content:encoded: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M’Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T’Challa’s death. As the Wakandans strive to embrace their next chapter, the heroes must band together with the help of War Dog Nakia and Everett Ross and forge a new path for the kingdom of Wakanda.

item.title: Prey for the Devil
item.content:encoded: In response to a global rise in demonic possessions, the Catholic Church reopens exorcism schools to train priests in the Rite of Exorcism. On this spiritual battlefield, an unlikely warrior rises: a young nun, Sister Ann. Thrust onto the spiritual frontline with fellow student Father Dante, Sister Ann finds herself in a battle for the soul of a young girl and soon realizes the Devil has her right where he wants her.

item.title: R.I.P.D. 2: Rise of the Damned
item.content:encoded: When Sheriff Roy Pulsipher finds himself in the afterlife, he joins a special police force and returns to Earth to save humanity from the undead.

item.title: Cop Secret
item.content:encoded: When Bússi, Iceland's toughest cop, is forced to work with a new partner to solve a series of bank robberies, the pressure to close the case as soon as possible proves too much for him.

item.title: The Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus
item.content:encoded: Christmas Eve takes a twisty turn when the Boss Baby accidentally swaps places with one of Santa's elves and gets stranded at the North Pole.

item.title: Lesson Plan
item.content:encoded: After a teacher dies, his best friend — a former cop — takes a job at the school where he worked to confront the gang he thinks was responsible.

item.title: Hex
item.content:encoded: Following a mysterious disappearance on a jump, a group of skydivers experiences paranormal occurrences that leave them fighting for their lives.

item.title: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora
item.content:encoded: The Making-of James Cameron's Avatar. It shows interesting parts of the work on the set.
item.wp:post_name: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora

item.title: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora.jpg
item.wp:post_name: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora.jpg

item.title: Medieval
item.content:encoded: The story of 14th century Czech icon and warlord Jan Zizka who defeated armies of the Teutonic Order and the Holy Roman Empire.

item.title: Blowback
item.content:encoded: When a master thief is sabotaged during a bank heist and left for dead, he seeks revenge on his former crew one target at a time. Now, with the cops and the mob closing in, he's in the race of his life to reclaim an untold fortune in cryptocurrency from those who double-crossed him.

item.title: Disenchanted
item.content:encoded: Disillusioned with life in the city, feeling out of place in suburbia, and frustrated that her happily ever after hasn’t been so easy to find, Giselle turns to the magic of Andalasia for help. Accidentally transforming the entire town into a real-life fairy tale and placing her family’s future happiness in jeopardy, she must race against time to reverse the spell and determine what happily ever after truly means to her and her family.

item.title: Emancipation
item.content:encoded: Inspired by the gripping true story of a man who would do anything for his family—and for freedom. When Peter, an enslaved man, risks his life to escape and return to his family, he embarks on a perilous journey of love and endurance.

item.title: One Way
item.content:encoded: On the run with a bag full of cash after a robbing his former crime boss—and a potentially fatal wound—Freddy slips onto a bus headed into the unrelenting California desert. With his life slipping through his fingers, Freddy is left with very few choices to survive.

item.title: Paradise City
item.content:encoded: Renegade bounty hunter Ryan Swan must carve his way through the Hawaiian crime world to wreak vengeance on the kingpin who murdered his father.

item.title: Avatar: Scene Deconstruction
item.content:encoded: The deconstruction of the Avatar scenes and sets

item.title: Abandoned
item.content:encoded: After a young couple moves into a remote farmhouse with their infant son, the woman's struggles with postpartum psychosis begin to intensify... as the house reveals secrets of its own.

item.title: The Minute You Wake Up Dead
item.content:encoded: A stockbroker in a small southern town gets embroiled in an insurance scam with a next-door neighbor that leads to multiple murders when a host of other people want in on the plot. Sheriff Thurmond Fowler, the by-the-book town sheriff for over four decades, works earnestly to try and unravel the town’s mystery and winds up getting more than he bargained for.
item.wp:post_name: The Minute You Wake Up Dead

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Minute You Wake Up Dead

item.title: The Minute You Wake Up Dead.jpg
item.wp:post_name: The Minute You Wake Up Dead.jpg

item.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
item.content:encoded: Siblings Lucy, Edmund, Susan and Peter step through a magical wardrobe and find the land of Narnia. There, they discover a charming, once peaceful kingdom that has been plunged into eternal winter by the evil White Witch, Jadis. Aided by the wise and magnificent lion, Aslan, the children lead Narnia into a spectacular, climactic battle to be free of the Witch's glacial powers forever.
item.wp:post_name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

item.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe.jpg
item.wp:post_name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe.jpg

item.title: Lost Bullet 2
item.content:encoded: Having cleared his name, genius mechanic Lino has only one goal in mind: getting revenge on the corrupt cops who killed his brother and his mentor.

item.title: Polar
item.content:encoded: MG, a policewoman who has been expelled from the Corps due to the problems with alcohol and drugs that she has had since the loss of her son, receives a call from a man asking her to look for Macarena Gómez, a popular TV actress.

item.title: Alien Sniperess
item.content:encoded: A female sniper on military leave promises to fulfill her fiancé’s dying wish until she encounters a hostile alien invasion and is tasked with saving countless lives.

item.title: Smile
item.content:encoded: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, Dr. Rose Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain. As an overwhelming terror begins taking over her life, Rose must confront her troubling past in order to survive and escape her horrifying new reality.

item.title: Fall
item.content:encoded: For best friends Becky and Hunter, life is all about conquering fears and pushing limits. But after they climb 2,000 feet to the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, they find themselves stranded with no way down. Now Becky and Hunter’s expert climbing skills will be put to the ultimate test as they desperately fight to survive the elements, a lack of supplies, and vertigo-inducing heights

item.title: Sniper: The White Raven
item.content:encoded: Mykola is an eccentric pacifist who wants to be useful to humanity. When the war begins at Donbass, Mykola’s naive world is collapsing as the militants kill his pregnant wife and burn his home to the ground. Recovered, he makes a cardinal decision and gets enlisted in a sniper company. Having met his wife’s killers, he emotionally breaks down and arranges “sniper terror” for the enemy. He’s saved from a senseless death by his instructor who himself gets mortally wounded. The death of a friend leaves a “scar” and Mykola is ready to sacrifice his life.

item.title: Scrooge: A Christmas Carol
item.content:encoded: On a cold Christmas Eve, selfish miser Ebenezer Scrooge has one night left to face his past — and change the future — before time runs out.

item.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
item.content:encoded: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: He has burned through eight of his nine lives, leaving him with only one life left. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.
item.wp:post_name: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

item.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish.jpg
item.wp:post_name: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish.jpg

item.title: Terrifier 2
item.content:encoded: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to Miles County where he must hunt down and destroy a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night. As the body count rises, the siblings fight to stay alive while uncovering the true nature of Art's evil intent.

item.title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
item.content:encoded: On a mission to make Christmas unforgettable for Quill, the Guardians head to Earth in search of the perfect present.
item.wp:post_name: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special

item.title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special.jpg
item.wp:post_name: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special.jpg

item.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
item.content:encoded: When the Primm family moves to New York City, their young son Josh struggles to adapt to his new school and new friends. All of that changes when he discovers Lyle — a singing crocodile who loves baths, caviar and great music — living in the attic of his new home. But when Lyle’s existence is threatened by evil neighbor Mr. Grumps, the Primms must band together to show the world that family can come from the most unexpected places.

item.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
item.content:encoded: A new school year, his brother Rodrick teases him over and over and over and over again. Will Greg manage to get along with him? Or will a secret ruin everything?
item.wp:post_name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules

item.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules.jpg
item.wp:post_name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules.jpg

item.title: No Abras La Puerta
item.content:encoded: Fausto and Esther childhood was tormented. Fausto, trying to escape from his father. Esther, mistreated by her brother-in-law. They both begin to be involved in a supernatural situation. Over which they have no control.

item.title: The Fabelmans
item.content:encoded: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.

item.title: Blade of the 47 Ronin
item.content:encoded: In this sequel to "47 Ronin," a new class of warriors emerges among the Samurai clans to keep a sought-after sword from falling into the wrong hands.

item.title: Violent Night
item.content:encoded: When a team of mercenaries breaks into a wealthy family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone inside hostage, the team isn’t prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he’s about to show why this Nick is no saint.

item.title: The Hip Hop Nutcracker
item.content:encoded: Features Rev Run as he brings audiences on a hip-hop reimagining of The Nutcracker ballet set in NYC.

item.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
item.content:encoded: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

item.title: Maneater
item.content:encoded: A group of friends on vacation in a seeming island paradise are stalked by an unrelenting great white after an accident leaves them stranded and left for dead.

item.title: Tom and Jerry Snowman's Land
item.content:encoded: It’s time to chase that holiday spirit with Tom and Jerry! With magic in the air, Jerry and his nephew, Tuffy, make a snow mouse that miraculously comes to life! To keep their new friend, Larry the snow mouse from melting, Tuffy and Jerry must race him to the fabled Snowman’s Village. In hot pursuit, Tom and devious Dr. Doublevay have their own plans for Larry’s magic.

item.title: Blue's Big City Adventure
item.content:encoded: When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy’s Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to NYC for the very first time where they meet new friends and discover the magic of music, dance, and following one’s dreams.

item.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
item.content:encoded: Paul Baumer and his friends Albert and Muller, egged on by romantic dreams of heroism, voluntarily enlist in the German army. Full of excitement and patriotic fervour, the boys enthusiastically march into a war they believe in. But once on the Western Front, they discover the soul-destroying horror of World War I.
item.wp:post_name: All Quiet on the Western Front

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: All Quiet on the Western Front

item.title: All Quiet on the Western Front.jpg
item.wp:post_name: All Quiet on the Western Front.jpg

item.title: Jeepers Creepers: Reborn
item.content:encoded: Forced to travel with her boyfriend to a horror festival, Laine begins to experience disturbing visions associated with the urban legend of The Creeper. As the festival arrives and the blood-soaked entertainment builds to a frenzy, she becomes the center of it while something unearthly has been summoned.

item.title: Top Gun: Maverick
item.content:encoded: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.

item.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
item.content:encoded: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

item.title: I Believe in Santa
item.content:encoded: Lisa thinks she's finally met the man of her dreams until she finds out he still believes in Santa Claus.

item.title: A Frozen Rooster
item.content:encoded: The rooster Toto has a new enemy: a pirate who plans to turn him into a cryogenically frozen rooster.

item.title: Jurassic World Dominion
item.content:encoded: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

item.title: Bones and All
item.content:encoded: Abandoned by her father, a young woman embarks on a thousand-mile odyssey through the backroads of America where she meets a disenfranchised drifter. But despite their best efforts, all roads lead back to their terrifying pasts and to a final stand that will determine whether their love can survive their otherness.

item.title: Corrective Measures
item.content:encoded: Set in San Tiburon, the world's most dangerous maximum-security penitentiary and home to the world's most treacherous superpowered criminals, where tensions among the inmates and staff heighten, leading to anarchy that engulfs the prison and order is turned upside down.

item.title: Bar Fight
item.content:encoded: Nina and Allen split everything in their lives 50/50 after their break-up to avoid any drama—everything, that is, except for their favorite local bar. Nina and Allen must compete in a ridiculous, tavern-style custody battle for their prized watering hole, in which lines will be drawn, sides will be chosen, and beers will be drunken.
